head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MULLANEY, JOSEPH P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MULLANEY, JOSEPH P.

block.p: MULLANEY-Joseph P. On July 22, 2000. Attorney. Beloved husband of Anne; loving father of Gerard, Denise, Peter, and Jocelin McNally. Devoted grandfather of Kathleen and Megan Mullaney. Reposing at Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 149-20 Northern Blvd, Flushing. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, 10:15 AM, at St. Andrew Avellino. Interment L.I. National Cemetery. Visiting Monday and Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-10 PM.
